Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.ui.gui

Class LoginController

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.client.ui.gui.WindowController
      • it.polimi.ingsw.client.ui.gui.LoginController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ClientListener, DuplicatedNicknameListener, MatchListener
    public class LoginController
extends WindowController
implements MatchListener, DuplicatedNicknameListener, ClientListener
    Class that manages the login screen
    Author:
    Adriana Ferrari
